column4: can anyone please help me with this problem....my sound works fine but the flash plugin in mozilla isn't drawing any sound
are you using flash 9?
i don't know....i guess its the latest...how do you check the version
just go to youtube, play a video and right click it, it should say the version of flash there
ok here's something i tried watching the same vid in opera......and that works fine
what is the deal with flash and mozilla
flash and mozilla are fine, its a pulse-audio issue... again, what version of flash are you using
ya its cool.......flash 9
upgrade to flash 10..
do i need to uninstall flash 9 first...or is there a way to just overwrite
i don't think you need to uninstall 9, i just went to adobe.com and download flash 10, and follow the instructinos to install it.
how is 10 working for you? is there any issue with the audio with that version ??
i've had no problems
hey it says here 10's released for the 64bit architecture........will it work on x86
there should be a 32bit file there, cuz i'm using it.
i removed flash player 9 and i downloaded the .deb file for fp 10 but the plugin's missing in firefox even after installing
that would e pretty unusual, i've used that .deb numerous times w/ no problem
i guess you didn't remove the flash 9 befor installing the flash 10.deb ?
i ddn' even install flash 9.. i just installed 10
directly using the .deb ? wierd.....i get to install 9 again using the plugin finder service after i installed 10
yeah that is strange...
nope no success......the idiot keeps intalling flash 9 after removing 10 !! :D
